column4: any ubuntu guru about that is willing tp answer some questions?

ok here we go, i am running ubuntu now, but somehow i think some things arent in order. I am running a dual boot setup (win xp and ubuntu ofcourse). WinXP has two partitions and Ubuntu 3 ( / , /home and /swap
i can see my windows drives
how have you tried to unmount them
what is the /dev/name of the drive
no, do sudo fdisk -l and tell me what the /dev/name is
umount is a command line program
but it might as well be, you will not find a linux distro that does not have umount
my /home partitions is /logical and wrapped inside an extended partition
whenever i try to do any file operations i get an error saying i do not have permission
